full_summary:
### Facilitation Services for Virtual Training Nurturing Well-Being in Call Centres

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Procurement Reference:** cb-480-97569458
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 100026412
**Publication Date:** June 3, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 26, 2024, 2:00 PM

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Contract Value:**
Estimated total contract value for the procurement is anticipated to be in the range of $[ confidential ].

**Scope:**
The procurement is seeking facilitation services to deliver virtual training courses to Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) call centre employees. The training title is "Nurturing Well-Being in Call Centres - Healthy Minds and Bodies" (Cultiver le bien-être en centre d’appels – Des corps et des esprits sains).

**Contract Period:**
The contract will be for a period from the award date to November 20, 2024, with an optional one-year extension to March 31, 2025.

**Tender Requirements:**
The successful bidder will provide facilitation services for the delivery of virtual training sessions to ESDC call centre employees. The sessions will take place from September 4, 2024, to November 20, 2024.

**Eligibility:**
_bidder must_ meet eligibility requirements and comply with Canada's legislation and regulations.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Cynthia Carty (cynthia.carty@hrs
